text: Khloé & Lamar is an American reality television series that debuted on E! in the United States and Canada on April 10th, 2011. The series is the third spin-off of the show Keeping Up with the Kardashians and features reality star Khloé Kardashian and her then-husband, basketball player Lamar Odom. The series returned for its second and final season on February 19, 2012. ==Cast== * Khloé Kardashian * Lamar Odom * Rob Kardashian — Khloé's younger brother, member of the Kardashian family. * Malika Haqq — Khloé's best friend. ===Supporting=== * Jamie Sangouthai — Lamar's best friend. He lives in the loft next door to Khloé and Lamar. He used to work for Lamar's brand, Rich Soil. * Joseph "Joe" Odom — Lamar's Father. Lamar has had an estranged relationship with his father but after encouragement from Khloé, they are reconciling. * Kourtney Kardashian — Khloé's oldest sister, member of the Kardashian family. * Kim Kardashian — Khloé's older sister, model, reality star and member of the Kardashian Family * Kris Jenner — Khloé's mother, businesswoman and television producer. ==Episodes== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- ! colspan="2" rowspan="2" |Season ! rowspan="2" |Episodes ! colspan="2" |Originally aired |- ! First aired ! Last aired |- | bgcolor="2daada" | | 1 | 8 | April 10, 2011 | May 30, 2011 |- | bgcolor="AE0057" | | 2 | 12 | February 19, 2012 | May 13, 2012 |} ===Season 1 (2011)=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="width:100%;" |- ! scope="col" style="background-color: #2daada; color: #FFFFFF;" width=7% | No. in series ! scope="col" style="background-color: #2daada; color: #FFFFFF;" width=7% | No. in season ! scope="col" style="background-color: #2daada; color: #FFFFFF;"| Title ! scope="col" style="background-color: #2daada; color: #FFFFFF;" width=20% | Original air date ! scope="col" style="background-color: #2daada; color: #FFFFFF;" width=14% | U.S. viewers (million) |- |} ===Season 2 (2012)=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="width:100%;" |- ! scope="col" style="background-color: #AE0057; color: #FFFFFF;" width=7% | No. in series ! scope="col" style="background-color: #AE0057; color: #FFFFFF;" width=7% | No. in season ! scope="col" style="background-color: #AE0057; color: #FFFFFF;"| Title ! scope="col" style="background-color: #AE0057; color: #FFFFFF;" width=20% | Original air date ! scope="col" style="background-color: #AE0057; color: #FFFFFF;" width=14% | U.S. viewers (million) |- |} ==Reception== Riley Sky of Dropkick Divas Media gave the series 3 out of 5 stars, saying "Khloé & Lamar is probably one of my favorite reality series. The show features each person's own personal struggles along with their families and their relationships. A show that finally features Khloe and her darling husband Lamar". ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:2010s American reality television series Category:2011 American television series debuts Category:2012 American television series endings Category:English-language television shows Category:Television series by Bunim/Murray Productions Category:Television series by Ryan Seacrest Productions Category:Keeping Up with the Kardashians Category:Reality television spin-offs Category:E! original programming Category:Kardashian family
